## Source: ossf-package-analysis (2e3e68fcb0722dd3025334d128515302686aff3ebed84afc0747731353153fff)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'testing-example-amnu' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
